supply_logistics.supply_status: Unknown - Division arrived in Tunisia during Operation Torch (November 1942) but specific supply state for Q4 1942 not documented in available sources.

tactical_doctrine.role: Luftwaffe panzer division deployed to Tunisia following Operation Torch
known_issues: Insufficient source data for 1942-Q4 - division arrived late November/early December 1942
Only organizational data available is from March-April 1943 (Q2 1943)
Formation history and initial TO&E require additional research

formation_date.reason: Division arrived in Tunisia November-December 1942, but exact organizational structure for 1942-Q4 not documented in Nafziger collection
sources_checked: The Rommel Papers (no Hermann Göring Division references found)
CARL German Luftwaffe Fallschirmjager PDF (no results)
formation_date.mitigation: Requires: (1) German Luftwaffe divisional records, (2) 5th Panzer Army OOBs for Nov-Dec 1942, (3) Tessin Wehrmacht Encyclopedia Luftwaffe volumes, (4) Unit war diaries from Bundesarchiv

initial_strength.reason: No personnel or equipment data available for 1942-Q4 arrival period
initial_strength.mitigation: March 1943 data from 943gcmc.pdf shows: 1/Hermann Göring Panzer Regiment, 2/,3/Hermann Göring Grenadier Regiment, 1/,3/Hermann Göring Jäger Regiment, Hermann Göring Flak Regiment. Initial deployment likely smaller kampfgruppe.

commander.reason: Division commander for 1942-Q4 not identified in available sources
commander.mitigation: Research needed: German Luftwaffe command records, 5th Panzer Army staff documents

research_brief.reason_for_tier_4: Less than 50% of required data available. Only Nafziger document covers March-April 1943, not 1942-Q4 arrival period.
sources_consulted: Nafziger Collection 943gcmc.pdf - Hermann Göring Division March-April 1943
The Rommel Papers text - no Hermann Göring Division references
CARL German Luftwaffe Fallschirmjager PDF - no results
Seed file north_africa_seed_units_COMPLETE.json - confirms presence in 1942-Q4
recommended_research_actions: Obtain Tessin Wehrmacht Encyclopedia volumes covering Luftwaffe divisions
Search Bundesarchiv for Hermann Göring Division war diaries November-December 1942
Locate 5th Panzer Army organizational documents for Operation Torch period
Research German Luftwaffe Field Division formation records 1942
Cross-reference with Axis Forces Sicily documents (division later deployed to Sicily)
Check Bender & Law 'Uniforms, Organization and History of the Afrikakorps' full text (cited in Nafziger PDF)

partial_data_preserved.march_1943_kampfgruppe_schmidt: 1/,3/Hermann Göring Grenadier Regiment; 1/,3/Hermann Göring Jäger Regiment; 9th Co., 59th Panzer Grenadier Regiment; 14th Co., 104th Panzer Grenadier Regiment; 2nd & 4th Cos., 90th Panzerjäger Battalion; T4 Afrika Battalion; 2/190th Artillery Regiment; Hermann Göring Flak Regiment; von Bülow Nebelwerfer Battalion
partial_data_preserved.april_1943_full_division: 1/Hermann Göring Panzer Regiment; 2/,3/Hermann Göring Grenadier Regiment; 1/,3/Hermann Göring Jäger Regiment; Hermann Göring Reconnaissance Battalion; 1/,2/Hermann Göring Flak Regiment; Hermann Göring Armored Signal Battalion; Hermann Göring Supply Battalion

known_facts.unique_characteristics: Elite Luftwaffe ground division, originally formed from Regiment General Göring

research_brief.next_steps_for_completion: This unit requires Tier 1-2 source acquisition before full extraction can proceed. Recommend either: (1) Skip 1942-Q4 and extract 1943-Q1/Q2 quarters using available Nafziger data, OR (2) Pause until Tessin/Bundesarchiv sources obtained.
